item.title: Oblique Strategies for Atom
item.description: Last week I built oblique-strategies, a package for Atom that displays a random aphorism if you stop typing for some time. Brian Eno and Peter Schmidt published a deck of cards in 1975 called Oblique Strategies. When you need inspiration, draw a card at random to read a strategy for thinking about a problem. Earlier this month, I read Kevin Lawlerâ€™s Oblique Strategies: Prompts for Programmers and decided to create this package that would do this for programmers.
